article.headline: UMBC 83, Hampton 65
article.story: CATONSVILLE, Md. (AP) -- Cavell Johnson had 19 points and 15 rebounds, reserve Matt Spadafora scored a career-high 18 points and undermanned Maryland-Baltimore County beat Hampton 83-65 on Saturday. Ray Barbosa had 15 points and Jay Greene added 11 points and 11 assists for the Retrievers (8-4), who are off to their best start in 22 Division I seasons. UMBC snapped a two-game losing streak. Rashad West scored 20 points to lead Hampton (5-6), which lost its third straight. Theo Smalling added 15 points. After West's three-point play put the Pirates up 47-43 with 14:48 left in the game, UMBC responded with a 15-0 run without Greene, who had gone to the bench with three fouls. Spadafora's right-side 3-pointer gave the Retrievers their first lead, 48-47, with 14:03 to go. He later added a transition layup for a five-point cushion. The Retrievers -- minus reserves Uwem Eshietedoho (broken leg) and Justin Fry (sprained ankle) -- dressed only nine players. The bench was further taxed when Darryl Proctor, who scored 15 points, fouled out with 2:13 remaining and Hampton behind by eight points. The Pirates wasted an early 10-0 lead and didn't take advantage of UMBC's 8-for-28 start from the floor. Smalling scored 10 first-half points for Hampton, which led 34-32 at halftime.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
